job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>We're hiring for a fast growing, Series A start-up, who have spun-off from a top-tier U.S University. Their leading AI product, is transforming the lives of patients and physicians, by re-imagining medical workflows with voice and machine learning.</p><p><br></p><p>Their product prepares medical charts, by listening to patient encounters, saving up to 3 hours a day for doctors. They're looking for a Senior NLP engineer to improve current machine learning models, working with the largest datasets of physician-patient encounters. </p><p><br></p><p>Why not join a team of top-tier university alumni, working with state-of-the-art machine learning, whilst revolutionizing healthcare? </p><p><br></p><p>You will:</p><ul><li>Take ownership of the architecture of machine learning models</li><li>Build, iterate and deploy models </li><li>Work alongside leadership to define roadmaps, representing ML model architecture</li><li>Improve efficiency of the human-in-the-loop component </li><li>Work on a variety of NLP problems</li></ul><p><br></p><p>You have:</p><ul><li>Masters or above in Computer Science or related field </li><li>Experience deploying machine learning models into production </li><li>An interest in healthcare</li><li>Experience working with natural language processing </li><li>Expertise with Python and deep learning frameworks</li><li>The ability to work in a fast paced environment </li></ul><p><br></p><p><em>Big Cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hire.</em></p>
